title: U.S. 'deeply concerned' about Iran: Pompeo
text:
U.S. 'deeply concerned' about Iran: Pompeo 12:44pm EDT - 00:53
U.S. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo said Sunday that the U.S. is 'deeply concerned' about what it says are 'Iran's ambitions to dominate the Middle East'. Rough Cut (No reporter narration.) ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
